title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship and clean coding practices.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical novel about finding one's destiny.

title: Python Crash Course
author: Eric Matthes
description: A fast-paced, project-based introduction to Python programming.

title: Cosmos
author: Carl Sagan
description: Exploring the universe and humanity's place in it.

title: Riyad-us-Saliheen
author: Imam An-Nawawi
description: Collection of hadith covering morals, manners, and worship.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: Your journey to mastery in software development.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter fantasy series.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Cormen, Leiserson, Rivest, Stein
description: A comprehensive textbook on algorithms with detailed explanations.

title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: An accessible introduction to cosmology and the universe.

title: Stories from 1001 Nights
author: Anonymous
description: A collection of Middle Eastern folktales from the famous Arabian Nights.

title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
author: Gamma, Helm, Johnson, Vlissides
description: Classic book on software design patterns and reusable object-oriented solutions.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel about manners, upbringing, morality, and marriage.

title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
author: Stuart Russell, Peter Norvig
description: One of the most comprehensive texts on artificial intelligence.

title: River Out of Eden
author: Richard Dawkins
description: Exploring evolution and the river of genes shaping life.

title: Sealed Nectar (Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum)
author: Safiur Rahman Mubarakpuri
description: A detailed biography of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).

title: The Old Man and the Sea
author: Ernest Hemingway
description: A story about an old fisherman and his struggle with a giant marlin.

title: Operating System Concepts
author: Abraham Silberschatz
description: Covers operating system principles with practical examples.

title: Black Holes & Baby Universes
author: Stephen Hawking
description: A collection of essays exploring the universe and black holes.

title: The Forty Rules of Love
author: Elif Shafak
description: A story blending modern and historical narrative about love and spirituality.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Rules for focused success in a distracted world.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A groundbreaking narrative of humanity's creation and evolution.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict family but pursues education.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: Insights into human thinking and decision-making processes.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The second book in the Harry Potter series, full of magic and adventure.
